name: Outro
commands: Whew, that should be all. They didn't even stand a chance!|Just a little further, right Pikno?
Ah, well...|That seems to be the case...
Let's go on! We can make it!
Well, thankfully that's over.|I see Aurelia ahead, let's go!
Seems like the streets are quiet...|The coronation serves as a time of reflection, as well as celebration afterwards for the Aurelians...|But, I am not glad to be back...
How BORING! They should be celeberatin' right now, girl!
Ah, Aurelia...|I am not glad to be back...
Oh! But, I find this cultural event to be exciting!|I can hardly wait!
Halt!|You are the envoy of Lord Sages, correct?
Why, yes, it is.|Sal here, in his stead.
Well, follow me to the service, you're almost late.|Also, I'm afraid only one of you may enter, it's tradition to only have one representative at the coronation.
Well, Sally! We'll wait for ya.
I wish I could see it with my own eyes...|Oh well, wish the prince... no, king my regards!
Well, follow me to the service, you're almost late.
Oh I see...|Well, I best hurry!
Right... Things are changing...|With father being with the Goddess...

But Sir Argento, change can be for the better, of course.|I swear that I will ensure the prosperity of all nations.|Aurelia is my home, a land of golden rays.|I wish for every man, woman and child to bask in the wonders of the world.
In the light...|I just feel as though I am lost in a cloud...
The Goddess works in strange ways.|This too, will pass.
I wish for you to help me, every step of the way, Emmie.|I know I cannot do this alone.
I will do whatever I can.
Now, we must prepare your speech, Elias.|Time is of the essence, we only have a few hours left!
We'll speak soon, Emmie, with me as king!|I can hardly believe the time has come...
source:
transition;Close
change_background;Forest 5 Day
music;74 Dance in the Dark
transition;Open
add_portrait;Sal;Left;no_block
if;game.check_alive('Pikno')
    add_portrait;Pikno;Right;no_block
    speak;Sal;Whew, that should be all. They didn't even stand a chance!|Just a little further, right Pikno?
    speak;Pikno;Ah, well...|That seems to be the case...
    speak;Sal;Let's go on! We can make it!
else
    speak;Sal;Well, thankfully that's over.|I see Aurelia ahead, let's go!
end
multi_remove_portrait;Sal;Pikno
transition;Close
change_background;Village 1 Daytime
transition;Open
location_card;Theowa, Aurelia
if;game.check_alive('Roag') or game.check_alive('Nako')
    add_portrait;Sal;Left;no_block
    if;game.check_dead('Roag')
        add_portrait;Nako;FarLeft
    elif;game.check_dead('Nako')
        add_portrait;Roag;FarLeft
    else
        add_portrait;Nako;MidLeft;no_block
        add_portrait;Roag;FarLeft
    end
else
    add_portrait;Sal;Left
end
if;game.check_alive('Roag')
    speak;Sal;Seems like the streets are quiet...|The coronation serves as a time of reflection, as well as celebration afterwards for the Aurelians...|But, I am not glad to be back...
    speak;Roag;How BORING! They should be celeberatin' right now, girl!
else
    speak;Sal;Ah, Aurelia...|I am not glad to be back...
end
if;game.check_alive('Nako')
    speak;Nako;Oh! But, I find this cultural event to be exciting!|I can hardly wait!;low_priority
end
add_portrait;SoldierBlue;Right
speak;SoldierBlue;Halt!|You are the envoy of Lord Sages, correct?
if;game.check_alive('Roag')
    speak;Roag;Ya! We're here to party!
else
    speak;Sal;Why, yes, it is.|Sal here, in his stead.
end
if;game.check_alive('Roag') or game.check_alive('Nako')
    speak;SoldierBlue;Well, follow me to the service, you're almost late.|Also, I'm afraid only one of you may enter, it's tradition to only have one representative at the coronation.
    if;game.check_alive('Roag')
        speak;Roag;Well, Sally! We'll wait for ya.
    end
    if;game.check_alive('Nako')
        speak;Nako;I wish I could see it with my own eyes...|Oh well, wish the prince... no, king my regards!
    end
else
    speak;SoldierBlue;Well, follow me to the service, you're almost late.
end
speak;Sal;Oh I see...|Well, I best hurry!
multi_remove_portrait;Sal;Roag;SoldierBlue;Nako
transition;Close
wait;1000
change_tilemap;EmelineRoom
transition;open
location_card;Aurelia Palace
music;Sorrowful Prince Pelleas
load_unit;EmelinePrincess;other
add_unit;EmelinePrincess;7,2
add_portrait;EmelinePrincess;Left
speak;EmelinePrincess;*Sigh*
load_unit;Elias;Other
add_unit;Elias;7,9
load_unit;Argento;Other
add_unit;Argento;8,9
move_unit;Elias;7,3;FLAG(no_follow)
move_unit;Argento;8,3;FLAG(no_follow)
multi_add_portrait;Elias;MidRight;Argento;FarRight
speak;Elias;Sister, is everything alright?
speak;EmelinePrincess;Oh, brother!|I'm just... Uncertain.
speak;Argento;Right... Things are changing...|With father being with the Goddess...
speak;Elias;But Sir Argento, change can be for the better, of course.|I swear that I will ensure the prosperity of all nations.|Aurelia is my home, a land of golden rays.|I wish for every man, woman and child to bask in the wonders of the world.
speak;EmelinePrincess;In the light...|I just feel as though I am lost in a cloud...
speak;Argento;The Goddess works in strange ways.|This too, will pass.
speak;Elias;I wish for you to help me, every step of the way, Emmie.|I know I cannot do this alone.
speak;EmelinePrincess;I will do whatever I can.
speak;Argento;Now, we must prepare your speech, Elias.|Time is of the essence, we only have a few hours left!
speak;Elias;We'll speak soon, Emmie, with me as king!|I can hardly believe the time has come...
remove_unit;Elias;;south
remove_unit;Argento;;south
multi_remove_portrait;Elias;Argento
expression;EmelinePrincess;CloseEyes
speak;EmelinePrincess;...
transition;Close
multi_remove_portrait;EmelinePrincess;Elias
